name: Portes Monstres Tresors
description: Character creation helper for the Portes Monstres Tresors character sheet (french free OGL retroclone of DnD B/X). Chat command is !pmt-rollchar 0 or 1 to roll a character. Option 0 is 3d6 in order, 1 is 4d6 keeps the 3 best dice in order. The rest of the commands are handled through roll template buttons.
